definition: insect damage/destruction of crops by pest insects
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: Also, it is well known that pests continue to eat crops, causing damage. The.
sentences.chinese: 此外，衆所周知，蟲災在繼續危害作物而造成損失。

sentences.english: The crops suffered from insect plague this year, it will definitely be a lean year.
sentences.chinese: 今年莊稼遭了蟲災，肯定是個歉歲了。

sentences.english: The crop of potatoes is sorely affected, a third to a half of them bad.
sentences.chinese: 因爲受蟲災，土豆的收成只有往年的六成。
